description: The image depicts a kitchen scene with various objects. On the left side, there is a black robotic arm holding a bottle. In the center, there is a white coffee machine. On the right side, there is a black robotic arm holding a bottle and a trash can. The objects are arranged in a way that suggests the robotic arms are interacting with the coffee machine and trash can.

objects.name: bottle
objects.location: The bottle is located on the countertop. It is in front of the coffee machine and to the right of the sink. The bounding box is [402, 46, 439, 152].
objects.purpose: The bottle is used to store liquid.
objects.relationship: The bottle is in front of the coffee machine and to the right of the sink.
